product_name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Expedition Dry Suit - Men's
long_description: The men's Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) Expedition dry suit lets you paddle where others can't. Tough nylon with Gore-Tex Pro Shell laminate is completely waterproof, extremely breathable and highly durable. Tough reinforcements at knees and seat boost abrasion resistance and durability; fabric patches on exterior of Gore-Tex are self-draining. Neoprene neck gasket seals with skin to help keep water out. Storable storm hood features adjustable drawstring and reflective tape; hood is designed to work with a paddling helmet. Adjustable neoprene band keeps suit snugly fitted around midsection using 2 large rip-and-stick tabs. Sleeve pockets on each arm store small essentials. Specialized sleeves enhance freedom of motion and won't restrict movement when paddling. Waterproof front-entry zipper eases dressing and relief zipper speeds pit stops. Adjustable leg and arm cuffs with rip-and-stick closures dial in the fit; arm cuffs have latex gaskets to enhance protection. Reflective highlights on front of suit enhance visibility in low light. Integrated Gore-Tex socks are more comfortable than latex gaskets and prevent water from entering suit at legs. Machine or hand wash in cold water with powdered detergent; do not bleach or dry clean; store dry, hanging or loosely folded.
short_description: The men's Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) Expedition dry suit lets you paddle where others can't.
